test2


static void test2(java.lang.String N)
Create N*N strings of the form "xxyy", where x and y vary independently between 1 and N. Time how long it takes to add them to a HashSet and check that they are there.

test3


static void test3(java.lang.String N)
Create N*N strings of the form "xXyY", where x and y vary independently between 1 and N, X = 2**16 - 31x - 1 and Y = 2**16 - 31y - 1. Time how long it takes to add them to a HashSet and check that they are there.

test4

Add the strings in ARGS[1..] to a TreeSet and HashSet as FoldedStrings, then check that their upper-case versions are in the sets also.
